title: Best of The Program | Nikki Haley & Scott Mann | 9/1/21
description:
Pat Gray joins the guys to talk about President Biden’s Afghanistan speech. If Biden’s Afghanistan response was a success, what does failure look like? Lt. Col. Scott Mann (Ret.) joins to discuss his task force operation, “Task Force Pineapple,” and the accountability that needs to be had within the government. Former U.S. Ambassador Nikki Haley joins to talk about how America should not recognize the Taliban. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
